title: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, and h6 elements

assertions.title: MUST convey the heading role, level, and name
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the element describes the following content, the level of the heading in the document outline, and the name of the heading.
examples: When applied to a heading, the heading might be announced as something like "<name> heading level <level>"

assertions.title: SHOULD provide shortcuts to jump to headings
assertions.rationale: Headings provide an outline of the page and users need to be able to quickly navigate to different sections of the page.
